rules_text:
Blitz Infusion deals 2 damage to any target.
Until end of turn, instant and sorcery spells you cast have “This spell deals 1 damage to any target” in addition to their other effects.

OG_1:
Blitz Infusion deals 2 damage to any target.
Until end of turn, instant and sorcery spells you cast have “This spell deals 2 damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker” in addition to their other effects.
